abstract: 'Our neighbours look out for each other.'
description: Cynthia Potter tells of her life in one of Melbourne's Housing Commission flats and her beloved son Elvis. Energetic, with a passion for insects, Elvis makes the most of life, while Potter does the best she can with what she's got.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002176; Celebrations of people and place : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2007
